    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dread Ampoule](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3292)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=548" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=590" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=598" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=669" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=699" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 285 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 245 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This flask is filled with a murky purple gas that briefly interferes with normal brain activity. A dread ampoule deals the listed mental damage and mental splash damage. On a hit, the target becomes [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit. Many types also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.
